content.title: We’re Fully Funded – In Just 10 Minutes! 🎉THANK YOU!
content.creator:
TwoTrees
February 19, 2025
content.content:
Dear TwoTrees Backers,
Wow! We are absolutely blown away by your incredible support. Thanks to all of you, we reached 100% funding in just 10 minutes! 🏆✨
Over the past few hours, we’ve received a flood of messages, questions, and suggestions from you. Many of you have expressed interest in additional accessories, and we hear you loud and clear! 👂👀We’re carefully reviewing all of your feedback and exploring ways to bring you more of what you need.🙌💥
We’ve also noticed the overwhelming curiosity about different aspects of the machine. From specifications to compatibility, we’re collecting all your questions and will be addressing them as soon as possible. Your engagement means everything to us, and we’re committed to keeping you updated every step of the way.💪✨
Thank you for making this launch such an amazing success.💨💯
Stay tuned for more updates soon!
With gratitude,
TwoTrees Team

comments.text: Happy for full funding. How and When will we be able to get access to our New toy

Definitely excited about this project. Appreciating the feedback from other backers to understand possible limitations of the setup and need for additional options. Really appreciate efforts to keep transport costs down, I reckon I might own a big boat by now with shipping costs to Oz. Any chance Amazon can't be involved or are all your nuts already in the fire. Anyway jokes aside, keen to understand best cnc tooling and output control and compatibility for laser.
Congratulation on a successful launch. I can’t wait to get my H40 ultra and put it to work. Question does any of the included programs allow you to scan a picture and carve tahr image?
considerate di offrire un set punte
